node.excerpt: 한국어 본문은 하단에서 보실 수 있습니다 😁 Reflections on Two Years of Work There were things I did well and areas where I fell short. There were positive aspects and ones I wish had gone differently. Most importantly, I gained many new insights about myself. What I Appreciated About the Work Environment The best part was the people. While everyone’s work styles differed, the interpersonal relationships were generally positive. I used to think I preferred to strictly separate work and personal matters, but I cam…

frontmatter.title: Reflections on first 2 years of my dev career / 개발 인생 첫 2년간의 회고
